header.rec_loc: At ANON's house in Northern Cyprus
header.topics: asking about some experiences in Northern Cyprus
header.activity: Some new acquaintances having coffee on a Sunday morning.
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, advising, requesting, inviting, anecdote telling, telling jokes

speaker.fls: French -- level unspecified; German -- level unspecified

unless you're in the Hollywood system and we're not so erm though it can sometimes end up there but if you are in Europe you're mainly looking to source money from lots of different countries so you know that Ireland has Shannon as a tax break they offer tax breaks to filmmakers Wales had tax breaks

for filmmakers there's all whole host of reasons why certain producers will put their hands up and say I'm Swedish you're British you're German and then somebody over there and we'll get together as a little kind of you know pot of er producers and then we'll try and get the money from our respective countries that's the co production route
so yo it's almost unlikely for a film of this magnitude that you'd find one producer who could get even if he's the top producer in the world
